ðŸ“– Summary: Sampler is a Go-based command-line tool that executes shell commands at specified intervals, visualizing their output in real-time through various terminal-based charts and providing alerting capabilities. It's designed as a lightweight alternative to complex monitoring systems for development and quick metric observation.
